humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the patient has 1 out of 11 lymph nodes positive for metastases (1/11). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pN' notation in the pathology report indicates the pathologic stage of the regional lymph nodes. In this report, it is stated as 'pN1 (1/11)'. This means that out of the 11 examined lymph nodes, one node had a metastasis. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.
